column5: Hello everyone  Some friends and I are looking to book a 4-5 day fishing trip this summer. We normally fish sturgeon lake and stay at Fish n Rest but we wanted to try something else this year. We were thinking either scugog, rice, buckhorn or pigeon lake.  Can any of you guys recommend a good place with at least half decent cottages on the lake? Websites, phone numbers or any other information would be great.  Thanks.
www.scotsmanpoint.com  On Buckhorn. This allows access to the try lakes without going thru any locks.
Loved it when I went there. Good largie and smallie fishing if you just paddle out...and you've got lots of areas to try if you have a big boat.
Call Andrea and tell her I sent you (Brady Kemp)  Great resort, and Andrea will take great care of you.
